# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a coarse conversion value from the raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: A string that is one of  [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/CoarseConversionValue/low], [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/CoarseConversionValue/medium], or [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/CoarseConversionValue/high].

## Discussion

You don’t need to call the initializer to use coarse conversion values. When you provide the coarse conversion value to the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/updatePostbackConversionValue(_:coarseValue:completionHandler:)] or [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/updatePostbackConversionValue(_:coarseValue:lockWindow:completionHandler:)] methods, use the static constants, [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/CoarseConversionValue/low], [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/CoarseConversionValue/medium], or [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdNetwork/CoarseConversionValue/high].

## Providing coarse conversion values

- **high**: A string constant value for indicating a high coarse conversion value.
- **low**: A string constant value for indicating a low coarse conversion value.
- **medium**: A string constant value for indicating a medium coarse conversion value.

items.description: A string constant value for indicating a high coarse conversion value.
items.name: high

items.description: A string constant value for indicating a low coarse conversion value.
items.name: low

items.description: A string constant value for indicating a medium coarse conversion value.
items.name: medium
